item.title: About
item.description:
DEADCATS

Diethylazodicarboxylate, conventionally abbreviated as DEAD and sometimes as DEADCAT, is an organic compound with the structural formula (C‚ÇÜH‚ÇÅ‚ÇÄN‚ÇÇO‚ÇÇ), which is also‚Äîsomehow‚Äîa CTF-playing Cybersecurity team.

We actively participate in online and on-site CTF competitions. We are a group of Cybersecurity Wizards interested in various areas including software security, web security, cryptography, IoT security, etc.
